name: Reaper of Immortals (itch)
description:
Reaper of Immortals is a 2D pixel art adventure game, it tells the story of a lost reaper that is seeking his true purpose.

Fight your way through countless enemies, reap everything that stands in your way, and find out the ultimate truth.


Featuring:

- 4 worlds, each with unique atmosphere.
- 16 challenging levels.
- 9 boss battles with different mechanics.
- 20 plus types of enemies.
- Thrilling adventure with unique characters and story telling.
- Controller support.
- Made by a single developer, who put his heart and soul into making the game.
